This is the life we are to present to the sick, telling them that if they have faith in Christ as the restorer, if they cooperate with Him, obeying the laws of health, and striving to perfect holiness in His fear, He will impart to them His life. When we present Christ to them in this 


                                                    707 

way, we are imparting a power, a strength, that is of value; for it comes from above. This is the true science of healing for body and soul.--MH 243, 244 (1905).
